tool_description:
GPTest is a powerful API that automatically generates comprehensive unit tests for your code. Say goodbye to tedious and time-consuming manual testing and let GPTest handle the job for you!
Convert code to unit test quickly with one HTTP request
name: GPTest
title: GPTest

api_list.name: Create Unit Test
api_list.description:
Provide a function -> unit test will be created for that function
Provide a whole file -> a unit test for each function will be created

"code" length is limited to 7 thousand characters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gptest1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v0/unit-test-generation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gptest1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gptest1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v0/unit-test-generation"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gptest1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
